content:
On the night of March 24, 2024, Russian invaders attacked 29 winged missiles X-101/X-555 of 14 aircraft of Tu-95MS strategic aviation (the area of the Genels of Engels-Russian -Akhtarsk -Russian, Cape Chaud -Crimea).

About thisreportAir Force of the Armed Forces.

As a result of airfill, 43 air targets were destroyed:

  • 18 Winged Missiles X-101/X-555,
  • 25 punch BLLLLA Shahed-136/131.

The department noted that they were killed by hostile missiles and drones within the Dnipropetrovsk, Kherson, Mykolaiv, Odessa, Sumy, Kyiv, Volyn and Lviv regions.

"Aircraft attacks were involved in the reflection of the Air Force and Fighter Aviation of Air Force, mobile fire groups, means of electronic struggle of the Defense Forces of Ukraine," the Armed Forces reported.
title: Flying winged rockets X-101/X-555 and shock Shahd: AFS of the Armed Forces at night destroyed 43 enemy targets
description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces. As a result of air -to -air battle, 43 were destroyed ...
author: Army Inform
